title: Does my phone support 3D acceleration?
answer:
Yes. To enable 3D acceleration, touch Settings > Developer options and select Force GPU rendering. 

 [Enabling 3D acceleration improves the gaming experience, but consumes memory as well. If you are playing a game only, great memory consumption does not affect your phone's running. If you are playing a game while multiple applications are running on your phone, the phone may run slowly.]()
